name: university-of-michigan-museum-of-anthropological-archaeology-philippine-textiles-collection-data
title: University of Michigan Museum of Anthropological Archaeology Philippine Textiles Collection Data
description: Metadata and data derived from University of Michigan Museum of Anthropological Archaeology Philippine Textiles Collection. A digital collection exhibit showcasing selected textiles from the University of Michigan Museum of Anthropological Archaeology's Philippine Collections.
